title: my current address book and realised it has no actual addresses just email addresses. . Is it still there somewhere? Now today after an update thunderbird is not showing how many emails in each section. Also no longer alerts to e mails in the spam folder
content: Could you please let me know if there are any fixes for the above 3 issues, the address book is the most important.It's all about Thunderbird and emails and the changes that keep getting made.
creator: jtfree

title: Problema visualizzazione email: puntatore ai messaggi si sposta in alto
content: Buongiorno, il sistema mi ha aggiornato TB alla versione 115.3.1 ma da quel momento, a parte l'impostazione grafica a me poco gradita,riscontro un problema di usabilit√†: il puntatore ai messaggi, si sposta autonomamente verso i messaggi precedenti e non punta, come faceva prima all'ultimo arrivato. Questo strano comportamento rende il programma poco piacevole da utilizzare e fa perdere un sacco di tempo a riportare verso il basso la lista messaggi con possibili errori dovendo digitare tasti e spostare il cursore. E' possibile risolvere questo errore? Grazie.
creator: cosentino1960

title: Attachment Pane
content: An update after July 1 has caused the attachment pane to disappear from the displayed emails. If I click on an email received after 1 July with the paperclip icon, no attachment pane shows at the bottom of the email. When I move to the next email in the list, the attachment pane very briefly flashes then disappears. This also happens when I move an email with a working attachment pane to another folder or sub-folder.
creator: neillb46

title: missing frame
content: There is a part where the main window frame is cut off in the upper left corner.

title: messages
content: Read messages are not displaying only new messages. Turning the filter on and off does not change anything.

title: Syncing Thunderbird across devices
content: Does anybody know if there are plans to give TBird the ability to sync across various devices like we can with Firefox and Outlook? If so , any idea of a timetable/ Thanks Chris
creator: chris119
